mapper.select: INSERT INTO TBL_FILE (ID, FILE_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE) VALUES(SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{filePath}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM (SELECT ID, FILE_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, COMMUNITY_ID FROM TBL_FILE F JOIN TBL_COMMUNITY_FILE C ON F.ID = C.ID AND COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId})
